original_text: When God judges everyone, the people who lived in Nineveh will be there. They will stand up and they will speak against you. They will show that the people who are alive today are bad. When Jonah spoke to the people in Nineveh long ago, they stopped doing bad things. But look! There is someone here now who is greater than Jonah was.’
korean_text: 심판 때에 니느웨 사람들이 일어나 이 세대 사람을 정죄하리니 이는 그들이 요나의 전도를 듣고 회개하였음이거니와 요나보다 더 큰 이가 여기 있느니라

sentences.original_text: the people who lived in Nineveh will be there
sentences.korean_translation: 니느웨에 살았던 사람들이 그곳에 있을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and they will speak against you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 너를 대하여 말할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will show that the people who are alive today are bad
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 오늘날 살아있는 사람들이 악하다는 것을 보여줄 것입니다

sentences.original_text: When Jonah spoke to the people in Nineveh long ago
sentences.korean_translation: 옛날에 요나가 니느웨 사람들에게 말했을 때

sentences.original_text: who is greater than Jonah was
